includedAssets.title: Droids In Distress
includedAssets.synopsis: Following the events of Star Wars Rebels: Spark Of Rebellion, a shipment of Imperial weapons leads the crew to a pair of familiar droids.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Following the events of Star Wars Rebels: Spark Of Rebellion, a shipment of Imperial weapons leads the crew to a pair of familiar droids.

includedAssets.title: Fighter Flight
includedAssets.synopsis: A simple supply run takes a dangerous turn when Zeb and Ezra draw the attention of Imperials and are forced to hijack a TIE fighter.

includedAssets.title: Rise Of The Old Masters
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - Rise Of The Old Masters
includedAssets.synopsis: An underground transmission sends the rebels on a daring rescue mission to save a Jedi Master.

includedAssets.title: Breaking Ranks
includedAssets.synopsis: Ezra goes undercover as a cadet at the Lothal Imperial Academy in a bid to steal an Imperial decoder.

includedAssets.synopsis: Hera and Sabine head to an abandoned asteroid base to get supplies, but they soon find themselves stranded and under attack.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hera and Sabine head to an abandoned asteroid base to get supplies, but they soon find themselves stranded and under attack.

includedAssets.title: Empire Day
includedAssets.synopsis: Ezra struggles with unanswered questions from the past on his birthday. Meanwhile, the Ghost crew uncover crucial Imperial information.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: As the evil Empire hunt down the galaxy's remaining Jedi, a rebel crew attempt to fight back, while their youngest member takes his first steps toward mastery of the Force. Animated spinoff of the Star Wars saga.
